roleset.name: raving, launching into a diatribe
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, rant-v.01. Comparison to lecture-37.11-1, manner_speaking-37.3.

example.name: arg0
example.text: I have no love for Bachmann and even less for Cameron , but I 'm not sure why she -LRB- or anyone else -RRB- should be expected to treat the batshitcrazy rantings of a has - been child actor like they 're super-important to the political scene .
example.arg: of a has - been child actor

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: His notion of a sustainable model for musicians is really weak and for all his ranting that the past is dead, itâ€™s still basically the past minus recording revenues.

example.name: args 0 and 3
example.text: In his ranting about the bourgeois obsession with gold there is more than a little envy.
example.arg: about the bourgeois obsession with gold
